mapper.insert: insert into Attachment values(seq_attachment.nextval, #{savePath}, #{originalName}, #{renameName}, 2, seq_membership.currval, 0, null)
insert into membership values(seq_membership.nextval, #{membershipName}, #{ membershipContent }, 1, default, #{ hostPhone }, #{ category })
insert into member values (#{memberId}, seq_membership.currval, #{grade}, sysdate, default )
mapper.select: select * from membership order by membership_no desc
select * from attachment where board_type= 2 order by attmid desc
select * from membership join member using(membership_no) where users_id like '%${searchWord}%' and grade = '모임장' order by membership_no desc
select * from membership where membership_name like '%${searchWord}%' order by membership_no desc
select * from membership join member using(membership_no) where membership_name like '%${searchWord}%' or (users_id like '%${searchWord}%' and grade ='모임장') order by membership_no desc
